name: Welcome to the BONE ZONE
description:
After a big night out a skeleton has lost all their bones. Interact with patrons at the famed skeleton club - The BONE ZONE - to find all your bones and head on home.

Originally made for Global Game Jam 2021, and then a bit more because my cat got sick on the last day.  

Controls  - WASD / Arrow Keys 

Content Warnings 

- Some swears, References to skeleton sex, References to death, References to alcohol
